name: FleetEvents
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline for Fleet Events

parameters.name: functionName
parameters.label: Function Name
parameters.helpText: Choose the sample function to run.

parameters.name: datastoreProjectId
parameters.label: Firestore Project
parameters.helpText: Choose the gcp project with firestore.

parameters.name: inputTopic
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Pub/Sub topic to read from.

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Output Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: Path of the output Pub/Sub topic.

parameters.name: gapSize
parameters.label: Gap size
parameters.helpText: How long to wait (in minutes) before considering a Vehicle to be offline.

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.label: Window size
parameters.helpText: Window size to use to process events, in minutes. This parameter does not apply to VEHICLE_OFFLINE jobs.
